name: Solitaire Tripeaks: Lucky Card
description:
Start your Lucky Adventure with Solitaire Tripeaks, you will experience the BEST TriPeaks solitaire card game on your mobile phones or tablets! Never played Solitaire or any card games before? No worries. Solitaire Tripeaks is Easy to play! Simply complete a quick tutorial and you'll learn how to play! It's a casual, entertaining free card game for everyone to enjoy! What are you waiting for?

HIGHLIGHTS
Great graphics and amazing beautiful themes.
1000+ different levels, with more in later version!
Daily exciting events and challenges, you will never get bored!
Fill up your Streak Meter to win free BONUSES and WILD cards!
Tri-peaks Solitaire in your hands, anytime, anywhere.

FEATURES
Land on the Leaderboard to compete with friends.
Single tap or drag & drop to move cards.
Most Challenging: it makes you think.
Feature to use Hints.

COME and TRY our Solitaire Tripeaks card game for FREE! Train your brain as well as kill time with it!

--100% Addictive & Fun, Download It NOW! --
